methods.label: createObject
methods.comment: Function to call relevant &quot;New&quot; method of the class. Must be overridden.
methods.signature: Public Function createObject(className As String, libName As String) As Variant

methods.label: getMeTypeForDebug
methods.comment: Creates a prefix for debug messages
methods.codesample:
%REM
The following code can be included in a base class&apos;s method. TypeName() will be called on the current object. So if debug is enabled, a message will be written that makes it clear which derived class&apos;s createObject() method is being called.
%END REM
Call DebugPrint_Samsara(&quot;Entering &quot; &amp; Me.getMeTypeForDebug &amp; &quot;.createObject&quot;)
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Creates a prefix for debug messages</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
methods.commenthtml: Creates a prefix for debug messages
methods.inlinecomment: ' Creates a prefix for debug messages
methods.codesamplehtml: %REM<br />The following code can be included in a base class&apos;s method. TypeName() will be called on the current object. So if debug is enabled, a message will be written that makes it clear which derived class&apos;s createObject() method is being called.<br />%END REM<br />Call DebugPrint_Samsara(&quot;Entering &quot; &amp; Me.getMeTypeForDebug &amp; &quot;.createObject&quot;)
